note.p: Daughter of Major-General Thomas Webster of Belgarvie, Fife. Married Robert Lambert Playfair in 1851.
Census returns of Scotland 1841 (The National Archives of Scotland: Monimail 1/43/420)

ODNB s.v. Playfair, Sir Robert Lambert
